description: A vulnerability was found in GZ Scripts PHP Vacation Rental Script 1.8. It has been classified as problematic. This affects an unknown part of the file /preview.php. The manipulation of the argument page/layout/sort_by/property_id leads to cross site scripting. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. The identifier VDB-233349 was assigned to this vulnerability. NOTE: The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way.
